snippet: The final decision to shake up Jeb Bush’s team was made only in the last few days, but word of turmoil in organization had been in the air for weeks.
abstract: The final decision to shake up Jeb Bush’s team was made only in the last few days, but word of turmoil in organization had been in the air for weeks.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and JONATHAN MARTIN

headline.main: Hints and Whispers Preceded Changes in Jeb Bush’s Team
